title: Internal compiler error: unexpected panic

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Happened today trying to build a current project of mine. Creating and building a new project works on stable, but produces the following error on nightly regardless of whether it is a fresh project or not. ### Code ```Rust fn main() { println!("Hello, world!"); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.57.0-nightly (5ecc8ad84 2021-09-19) binary: rustc commit-hash: 5ecc8ad8462574354a55162a0c16b10eb95e3e70 commit-date: 2021-09-19 host: aarch64-apple-darwin release: 1.57.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: "Provided allocation has wrong size for slot count 131072"', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/decoder.rs:263:29 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.57.0-nightly (5ecc8ad84 2021-09-19) running on aarch64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C split-debuginfo=unpacked -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `hello_world` ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: _rust_begin_unwind 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt 2: core::result::unwrap_failed 3: rustc_metadata::rmeta::decoder::CrateMetadata::new 4: rustc_metadata::creader::CrateLoader::maybe_resolve_crate 5: rustc_metadata::creader::CrateLoader::maybe_resolve_crate 6: rustc_metadata::creader::CrateLoader::process_extern_crate 7: ::visit_item 8: rustc_ast::visit::walk_item 9: ::visit_item 10: rustc_expand::expand::AstFragment::visit_with 11: rustc_resolve::macros::::visit_ast_fragment_with_placeholders 12: rustc_expand::expand::MacroExpander::collect_invocations 13: rustc_expand::expand::MacroExpander::fully_expand_fragment 14: rustc_expand::expand::MacroExpander::expand_crate 15: rustc_session::utils::::time 16: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand 17: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::expansion 18: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 19: rustc_span::with_source_map 20: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set ```
